# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(steam-input STATIC
  input.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(steam-input)

if(COMPILER_CLANG)
  target_compile_options(steam-input PRIVATE -Wno-cast-function-type-strict)
endif()

target_include_directories(steam-input PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(steam-input PUBLIC
  steam-api)
